title: Connection of Electrical Equipment to Earth
fullText:
Equipment required to be earthed shall be arranged for connection to:
•	(a) Protective earthing conductors in the form of cables, cords, busbars, or similar forms of current-carrying material.
•	(b) Another earthing medium, such as conductive parts of cables, wiring enclosures, switchboard framework, or the like, in accordance with Clause 5.3.2.
Equipotential bonding shall be arranged in accordance with Clause 5.6.
